text:
QuasarDB | C++ Software Engineer | Paris, France | Onsite

QuasarDB is a high-performance, distributed, time series database. High profile customers in finance and aeronautics rely on QuasarDB to process TB of data in real time.

We are looking for a C++ Software Engineer to join the core team. Come and join us to write the best C++ of your life!

More information: https://quasardb.net/careers/
